metadata.title: CVE-2017-14166 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
libarchive 3.3.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(xml_data heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a craftedxar archive, related to the mishandling of empty strings in the atol8function in archive_read_support_format_xar.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.6
bsdtar - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.6
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-7ubuntu2.6').
